job.title: Associate Attorney
job.description: If you are a Associate Attorney with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtTop Reasons to Work with UsltbrgtltbrgtSuccessful Texas based law firm with an excellent reputation We specialize in insurance defense and complex litigationltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt Insurance Defenseltligtltligt Personal Injuryltligtltligt LitigationltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a Associate Attorney with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtJoshHeidemannCyberCoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  JH61620871  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtJosh Heidemann  Sr Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right to Workltstronggt  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hireltbrgtltbrgtCyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ban the Box Ordinance
